name: Jones on Fire
overview: Become Emma Jones, firefighter extraordinaire, tough cookie and kitten lover in this frenetic, side-scrolling fun! Become Emma Jones, firefighter extraordinaire, tough cookie and kitten lover. Beat 10 levels of dangerous mountain terrain, improving Jones' skills with every fluffy life saved. Strive for ever higher scores, and gain the adoration of millions of cats! Save the kitties! You're their only hope!
